formattedAddress: 349 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 349 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text:
I must truly say a big thank you from the White family to Terry and his team from First Avenue Funeral Services.

My family came from out of town to New York for one week to do finalize arrangements for my husband's father. There were many things we have not a clue on what to do; things outside of the funeral home services, but Terry was there with us guiding us right through the entire process. He was so pleasant and understanding. I even thought it was too much for him to help us through, but he did.

Terry made this phase of our lives almost seamless. Less things for us to deal with and think through. He took our calls any time, or if he couldn't, rest assured he would have returned our calls.

I would certainly recommend anyone to First Avenue Funeral Services.

Thanks again Terry!

originalText.text: I pray to God that my family will never use this funeral home again on October 13 we had my brother service after the pastor of the church finish praying over the body. The gentlemen did not let the family walk my brother out my mother and his mother had no knowledge of the guy closing the casket without his mother saying her last goodbye. He was very rude and disrespectful. Then he left the body on the corner and ran back inside of the church, I don’t understand what kind of funeral home they are running but when I use this for my Dad service, we had the old owner of the funeral home even though she was smoking and drinking she was very respectful and I loved person they charge us all this money, but don’t have respect for the body and the family

originalText.text:
Thank you!! Thank You!! Thank you!!! Many many thanks to First Ave Funeral Service for an exceptional job WELL DONE! The funeral home  and the staff that were there for my aunts funeral service Dr. Valerie Gibbs did an amazing job! The young  man and lady that worked the service were very very attentive and patient to all of our families needs as we were dealing with
such a difficult loss.
Thank you again to all at First Ave
Funeral.Service I will always recommend your services.

originalText.text: Recently loss my mother and I am so grateful I came to First Ave Funeral Services. Not only were they so accommodating but they made my family and I feel so comfortable and welcomed. The service was beautiful, and my mother looked beautiful. Tanya did an amazing job and Tarry was extremely helpful with the process of choosing the arrangements for my mom. The priest we had was extremely kind and said such a beautiful blessing for my mom and my family. The chapel was intimate enough for us to listen to my mothers favorite music and we were able to have a slideshow as well. I’m very grateful for how kind and helpful everyone was that day and prior too it. Thank you for making this day a little easier for my sister and I.

originalText.text: I would recommend First Avenue Funeral Services, because they made my daughter and I feel at home. If you are looking for a place to get support and comfort, then this funeral home is an excellent choice. They helped and supported us in our time of our grief.
